SEARCH
Package org.application.rooms

Interface IRoomsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RoomsService
public interface IRoomsService
Represents a service interface for managing Room entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to room service.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Room
    addRoom(String name, int capacity, int floor, Room.Type type)
    Adds a new Room with the given name, capacity, floor and type.

  • Method Details

    • addRoom

      Room addRoom(String name, int capacity, int floor, Room.Type type) throws RoomAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Room with the given name, capacity, floor and type.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Room.
      capacity - The capacity of the new Room.
      floor - The floor of the new Room.
      type - The type of the new Room.
      Returns:
      The newly created Room.
      Throws:
      RoomAdditionException - If the Room could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name, capacity, floor or type are invalid.

    • deleteRoom

      boolean deleteRoom(int roomId) throws RoomNotFoundException, RoomDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes a Room with the given id.
      Parameters:
      roomId - The id of the Room to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Room was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - If the Room with the given id was not found.
      RoomDeletionFailed - If the Room could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • deleteRooms

      boolean deleteRooms(String name) throws RoomDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes all Rooms with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Rooms to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Room was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RoomDeletionFailed - If the Room could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided name is invalid.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws RoomDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Room entities.
      Returns:
      True if all Room entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RoomDeletionFailed - If the Room entities could not be deleted.

    • getRoomById

      Room getRoomById(int roomId) throws RoomNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Retrieves a Room by its ID.
      Parameters:
      roomId - The ID of the Room to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Room with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - If the Room with the given ID was not found.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.

    • getRooms

      List<Room> getRooms()
      Retrieves all Room entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Room entities.
